name: autohide the menu & sidebar [ZDNet]
description: Hides the ZDNet header, footer, and sidebar. (But not permanently - hover at the left edge of the screen to restore them.)
additional_info: This style is applied to all pages on www.zdnet.com and downloads.zdnet.com. It may work on other ZDNet subdomains. 2013-02-14: Update selectors for new ZD layout
